enable.name: Enable Ammo Swapper
enable.hint: Check this to enable Ammo Swapper HUD in this browser.

quantity.name: Show Ammo Quantity
quantity.hint: Check this to display amount of ammunition available in the Ammo Swapper HUD.

draggable.name: Make Window Draggable
draggable.hint: Check this to allow dragging the Ammo Swapper window in order to reposition it.

resetPosition.name: Reset Position
resetPosition.hint: Check this to reset the Ammo Swapper's position to default.
